title: Unused Import - Verdict in Standalone
description: standalone.py imports Verdict but never uses it. Fix: Remove unused import

title: No Tests for Docker Plugin
description: plugins/docker.py functions are untested

title: Unnecessary Abstraction - Environment Hierarchy
description: Complex hierarchy with minimal reuse. CompositeEnvironment likely unused

title: No Tests for PipelineAdapter
description: 927 lines with ZERO test coverage. Fix: Create tests/test_pipeline_adapter.py

title: Missing Retry Logic in Pipeline Adapter
description: No retry on transient failures. Fix: Add exponential backoff

title: Content Hashing Never Used - YAGNI
description: Complex deterministic hashing in evaluation.py:313-343 that's never used by any code. Fix: Remove until actually needed

title: Dual Result Schema Conflict - Three competing schemas exist
description:
Three competing result schemas exist simultaneously:
- EvaluationResult in core/evaluation.py (lines 203-385)
- TestResult in adapters/base.py (lines 49-177)
- SequenceResult in core/result.py (lines 72-152)

TestResult.to_evaluation() converts between schemas but this creates confusion.

**Impact:** Developers don't know which schema to use, conversion overhead, inconsistent APIs

**Fix:** Pick ONE schema (recommend EvaluationResult), delete others, migrate all code

title: Inconsistent Naming Conventions
description: Mixed naming patterns throughout. Fix: Adopt snake_case consistently

title: Timeout Not Enforced in Streaming Mode
description: readline() blocks forever if process hangs. Fix: Use non-blocking I/O

title: Dead Code - _parse_test_output in DockerCompose
description: Method defined but never called. Fix: Remove dead code

title: No Tests for Template Rendering
description: templates/renderer.py has no test coverage

title: Code Duplication - Django Settings Detection
description: Identical logic in pipeline_adapter.py and pytest_adapter.py. Fix: Extract to utils

title: Race Conditions in Pipeline Polling
description: No synchronization for concurrent executions. Fix: Add session isolation

title: Factory Functions Unnecessary
description: Factory functions that just call constructors add indirection without value. Fix: Use constructors directly

title: No Validation of Metric Severity Values
description: severity accepts any string. Fix: Use Enum

title: No Tests for DockerResourceManager
description: Complex Docker management code has no test coverage

title: Bare Except in CLI Django Detection
description: cli.py uses bare except. Fix: Use specific exception types

title: Pipeline Adapter Django Coupling
description: Direct Django ORM imports violates adapter pattern. Fix: Create abstraction layer.

title: Boolean Trap in CLI Options
description: Multiple boolean flags with unclear relationships. Fix: Use exclusive option groups

title: TestResult.total Bug - Treats 0 as not provided
description: Explicit total=0 gets overwritten. Fix: Use Optional[int]

title: Configuration Over-engineering
description: 6 config models for simple YAML. Fix: Simplify to 2-3 models

title: No Tests for Config Loading
description: load_config() has no test coverage for edge cases

title: _builtin_list Workaround - Naming Conflict
description: cli.py stores builtin list because click group shadows it. Code smell. Fix: Rename click group

title: Verdict Enum Duplication - Three identical enums defined
description:
Three identical Verdict enum definitions exist:
- base.py:18-22: PASS, FAIL, ERROR
- evaluation.py:45-57: PASS, FAIL, ERROR
- result.py:19-24: PASS, FAIL (2 states - inconsistent!)

**Impact:** Import confusion, inconsistent error handling, type checking breaks

**Fix:** Single Verdict enum in core/types.py, single import source

title: No Structured Logging Framework
description: Inconsistent logging methods. Fix: Standardize on Python logging

title: No Tests for DockerComposeEnvironment
description: Docker lifecycle handling with ZERO test coverage

title: AI Slop - Verbose Docstrings
description: Overly verbose docstrings with redundant information throughout codebase. Fix: Single-line docstrings for simple functions, move examples to docs

title: No Tests for PytestAdapter
description: Default adapter with ZERO test coverage. Fix: Create comprehensive tests

title: Test Executor Regex Parsing Fragility
description: Brittle regex patterns with fallback guesses. Fix: Use structured output

title: No Tests for StandaloneEnvironment
description: Process lifecycle handling with no test coverage

title: Missing Error Handling - Bare except blocks
description: Bare try/except blocks swallow errors silently. Fix: Specific exceptions, logging
